messages.title: Dear Resident,
messages.content: This May you will have a chance to decide who will be your MP and who will run your local Council for the next four years. As your Conservative Parliamentary Candidate, I have been absolutely delighted with the response I have received from local people to my positive campaign. It has been very encouraging to meet hundreds of residents who have promised me and the Conservative Party their support.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: An economy strong enough to fund the NHS, which saved my life four years ago.
An in-out referendum on our membership of the European Union by the end of 2017.
Improved national infrastructure around Stoke-on-Trent's great location, the A500 and A50.
Busy high streets, with every Council car park free after 3pm every day and all day every Sunday.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labourâ€™s majority is only 4,000 over the Conservatives here in Stoke-on-Trent South, so every vote counts this 7th May.

housing.content: Busy high streets, with every Council car park free after 3pm every day and all day every Sunday.

leaflet.personalStatement: This election is not about what we are against, but about what we are for and what we can achieve together.

images.caption: Joe Rich, Conservative Parliamentary Candidate for Stoke-on-Trent South
